headline: Citing Imminent Danger Cloudflare Drops Hate Site Kiwi Farms
short_description: Cloudflare CEO Matthew Prince had previously resisted calls to block the site.

headline: Bear Spotted Chilling In California Swimming Pool
short_description: "He's welcome in my yard as long as he doesn't kill me or my family," the homeowner quipped.

headline: Uvalde Fourth Graders Waited An Hour With Wounded Teacher
short_description: When Elsa Avila looks at the scar that runs down her torso, she can't help remember May 24, when a gunman stormed her fourth grade wing at Robb Elementary in Uvalde, Texas, killing 19 children and two teachers and leaving her and others wounded.

headline: Trump-Endorsed Wisconsin Gubernatorial Candidate Tells Voters To Take Up Pitchforks
short_description: Tim Michels calls on supporters to go after media following Milwaukee Journal Sentinel story reporting multimillionaire's donations to anti-abortion groups.

headline: Memphis Police: Arrest Made In Jogger's Disappearance
short_description: Police in Tennessee say an arrest has been made in the disappearance of a woman who was abducted while jogging.

headline: FEMA Director Says It's ‘Too Early’ To Tell When Jackson Will Have Clean Water Again
short_description: Residents of Mississippi's majority-Black capital still don't have clean water after rains worsened the existing infrastructure.

headline: Pakistan's Largest Natural Lake Is Rising To Dangerous Levels Due To Monsoon
short_description: Authorities warn that more flooding is expected as Lake Manchar swells from unprecedented monsoon rains that have killed nearly 1,300 people.

headline: Uvalde Children Grapple With Trauma After School Massacre
short_description: Students who survived the May 24 shooting at Robb Elementary in Texas are spending the summer with a host of mental health issues, including PTSD.
authors: Acacia Coronado and Adriana Gomez Licon, AP

headline: Emergency Declared As Flash Flooding Hits Northwest Georgia
short_description: Thunderstorms and heavy rain pounded parts of northwest Georgia on Sunday, sparking flash flooding and dangerously high waters in some areas.

headline: 'The Osbournes' Will Return In British Revival On BBC: 'Same Laughter, Love And Tears'
short_description: Millennials might remember the family's MTV reality series from the early 2000s. The BBC series will be filmed at the 350-acre Osbourne estate in England.
